page.title: 04OGBOURNE MAIZEY FARM
page.content: Mr R Curnick is the owner and farmer. The land is 500 acres.It stretches from east of the A345 at Ogbourne Maizey to the Rockley plantations on the hilly land of the Marlborough Downs.{Acres of crops and grass:} winter wheat-300,winter barley-47, spring barley-70,temporary grass-60, permanent grass-20,for hay-40,wood- land-3. {Livestock:}180 ewes,316 lambs 40 beef cattle in winter only. { {Machinery:}4 tractors,1 combine harvester,1 bailer,3 ploughs,1 disc harrow,2 other harrows,3 cultivators, 1 seed drill,1 elevator,1 spraying machine,1 bail sledge,3 hay turners,4 trailers,1 tipping lorry,1 fork-lift truck. {Labour:}1 man fulltime,1 man part-time. {For 1 acre of winter wheat seed-75kg,fertiliser-400kg used 4 times,sprays-Â£60 worth,6 times.Likely yield-3 tonnes an acre.
